bioAsHtml: Jeroen De Wit is the CEO and co-founder of Teamleader, a software for SME’s that focusses on contact relationship management (CRM), invoicing and project planning combined in one tool. Entrepreneurship is in his blood: when he met his co-founder Willem Delbare in high school, they started a company that created all kinds of web apps. He combined running that company while attending university, resulting in the title of Student Entrepreneur of the year 2010. The web company gradually switched their core business from creating web apps to CRM, primarily to satisfy their own need for a decent tool. Starting from June 2012 Jeroen, together with his co-founders Willem and Mathias, released the online software Teamleader, which is currently conquering the European SME market. Jeroen’s never ending enthusiasm always knows how to motivate and inspire his co-workers. His innovative ideas are destined to ensure a successful future.
